translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも、ランスがなんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or maybe, something about Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ。複雑な話ではありませんよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No. It's not a complicated matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 単純に、利益ある話を持ち込まれたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Simply, a profitable offer was brought to me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が精査、手配しただけのこと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I just examined and arranged it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「持ち込まれた……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Brought to you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスに懇意の業者が版図を広げるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's beneficial for a favored merchant in Lisas to expand their territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後々、私たちにとってもやりやすい事ですので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because that will make things easier for us in the long run.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そらそうやろうけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ、誰から……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From whom exactly...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジオ市長ですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From Mayor Gio.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジオ市長って……パパデマスのおっさん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mayor Gio? You mean the old man from Papademas!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ。ジオとの商取引の一環であれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. If it's part of commercial dealings with Gio,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私やリア様が直接動く理由たりえますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's reason enough for Lady Ria or me to get involved directly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んんん……そら、ジオは金持ちやけどなあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Gio is rich, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちらが苦しんだ末に助ける方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wouldn't it be more profitable to help us after we've suffered?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高く売れるんと違いますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That would sell for a higher price, don't you think?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………コパンドン殿は、商人ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Mr. Copandon, you're a merchant, aren't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　そらそうやけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? Well, yes, of course...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリスは結局、それ以上
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, Maris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その件に関して語ろうとはしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: did not wish to speak further on that matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けーっきょく、どういうハラか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, I couldn't quite understand their intention...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よう分からんかったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I really didn't understand it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「純粋な取引の結果っぽいですし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems to be the result of a straightforward business deal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気にしすぎなくとも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you don't have to worry too much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まーそーやけどな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, that's true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんか、ケツの据わりが悪いというか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But somehow, I still feel unsettled...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「『そして私の出陣である。盟友である総統ランスに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'And this is my sortie. I stand shoulder to shoulder with my ally, the Supreme Commander Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は肩を並べ、武器を抜く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I stand side by side and draw my weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その威は魔物達を怯ませ……』」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our might terrifies the monsters...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、パパデマス都市長」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Mayor Papademas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んを？　これはコパンドン都市長。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm? This is Mayor Copandon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お疲れ様ですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good work, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういや、あんた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊に入れさせられてたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were forced to join the demon extermination squad, weren't you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、何故か…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, for some reason...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいや！　総統殿とは元々戦友！　ですからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no! I was originally a comrade-in-arms with the Supreme Commander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………まあええわ。直接聞こか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Well, whatever. I'll ask you directly.
The truth is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンは今回の件に関して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon explained the matter this time to Papademas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパデマスに説明した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He explained to Papademas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……あの件ですか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Ah... that matter, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見つけたので処置したまでですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just found it and took care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスを噛ませて？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'You involved Lisas in this?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ。リーザスには介入させる恩、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Yes. We owe Lisas by letting them intervene,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 業者には大口の取引の恩を売り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we show favor to the merchant with large deals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かつ我々とのパイプを繋げる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and at the same time establish connections with us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「更に新しく淀みのない企業を介入させることで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Furthermore, by involving a new, untainted company,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対立候補を作り市場の腐敗を防ぐのが目的です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the goal is to create competition and prevent market corruption.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうすれば、例の汚職業者も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'That way, the corrupt merchant from before might'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間を置いて使えるように戻るかもしれませんし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: be able to be used again after some time has passed.'

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊に入れさせられてたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were forced to join the demon extermination squad, weren't you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、何故か…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, for some reason...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああいや！　総統殿とは元々戦友！　ですからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no! I was originally a comrade-in-arms with the Supreme Commander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………まあええわ。直接聞こか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Well, whatever. I'll ask you directly.
The truth is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンは今回の件に関して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon explained the matter this time to Papademas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパデマスに説明した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He explained to Papademas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……あの件ですか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Ah... that matter, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見つけたので処置したまでですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just found it and took care of it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスを噛ませて？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'You involved Lisas in this?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ。リーザスには介入させる恩、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Yes. We owe Lisas by letting them intervene,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 業者には大口の取引の恩を売り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we show favor to the merchant with large deals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かつ我々とのパイプを繋げる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and at the same time establish connections with us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「更に新しく淀みのない企業を介入させることで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Furthermore, by involving a new, untainted company,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対立候補を作り市場の腐敗を防ぐのが目的です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the goal is to create competition and prevent market corruption.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうすれば、例の汚職業者も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'That way, the corrupt merchant from before might'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間を置いて使えるように戻るかもしれませんし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: be able to be used again after some time has passed.'
